articles.title: Explained: How North Korea’s absence impacts India’s Olympic medal hopes - The Indian Express
articles.description: North Korea’s decision, announced Tuesday, to skip the Tokyo Olympics because of the Covid-19 pandemic, will boost the chances of the two Indian contenders to finish on the podium at the July 23-August 9 Games.
articles.content:
For Mirabai Chanu and Vinesh Phogat, the quest for an Olympic medal got a little less complicated.
